name: Format\MoveInAnimation
description: The animation whereby a component moves in from the side of the screen.

properties.name: type
properties.description: This animation always has the type move_in.

properties.name: preferredStartingPosition
properties.description:
Indicates which side of the screen should be the starting point of the animation. Valid values:
By default, the animation will start on the side that is closest to the component.

properties.name: userControllable
properties.description: Indicates whether the animation is controlled by (is in response to) user action (true) or happens automatically (false).
